British SF Association Awards 2016


science fiction awards database














British Fantasy <— 2016 thread —> Chesley
2017 <— British SF Association Awards —> 2015

Where and When : Mancunicon, Manchester : March 25, 2016 - March 28, 2016
Eligibility Year : 2015
Novel
  • Winner: The House of Shattered Wings , Aliette de Bodard (Gollancz)
  • Europe at Midnight , Dave Hutchinson (Solaris)
  • Glorious Angels , Justina Robson (Gollancz)
  • Luna: New Moon , Ian McDonald (Gollancz)
  • Mother of Eden , Chris Beckett (Corvus)
Short Story
  • Winner: “Three Cups of Grief, by Starlight”, Aliette de Bodard (Clarkesworld Jan 2015)
  • Binti , Nnedi Okorafor (Tor.com)
  • “No Rez”, Jeff Noon ( Interzone Sep/Oct 2015)
  • “Ride the Blue Horse”, Gareth L. Powell ( Matter 28 Jul 2015)
  • Witches of Lychford , Paul Cornell (Tor.com)
Artwork
  • Winner: Jim Burns for Pelquin's Comet by Ian Whates (Newcon)
  • Vincent Sammy for Interzone
  • Sarah Anne Langton for Jews Versus Zombies by Lavie Tidhar & Rebecca Levene, eds. (Jurassic London)
Nonfiction
  • Winner: Rave and Let Die: The SF and Fantasy of 2014 , Adam Roberts (Steel Quill)
  • “From Annihilation to Acceptance: A Writer's Surreal Journey”, Jeff VanderMeer ( The Atlantic Jan 2015)
  • Letters to Tiptree , Alisa Krasnostein & Alexandra Pierce , eds. (Twelfth Planet)
  • “Time Pieces: Doctor Change or Doctor Die”, Nina Allan ( Interzone Nov/Dec 2015)
  • “What Price, Your Critical Agency”, Jonathan McCalmont ( Ruthless Culture 8 Jul 2015)
